name: Powder Keg
description: Place a barrel that explodes when shot, or on landing after launched via melee attack or bounce pad. Has a minimum arm time before it can explode.

name: Bounce Pad
description: Drop a bounce pad in the world that sends you and other heroes flying. You will stomp down on landing, dealing damage to any nearby enemies.

name: Spirit Lasso
description:
Grab an enemy with your lasso and drag them along behind you. The enemy is stunned and Astro is slowed slightly during the lasso.

Lasso duration is paused for {s:BouncePadExtendDuration}s during the first usage of a bounce pad.

name: Hat Trick
description: Throws out her hat to strike enemies, slowing and revealing them through walls.

name: Shoulder Charge
description: Charge forward, colliding with enemies and dragging them along. Hitting a wall will Stun enemies caught by {s:hero_name}. Speed increased after colliding with enemy Heroes.

name: Infernal Resilience
description: Regenerate a portion of incoming damage over time.

name: Seismic Impact
description:
Leap high into the air and choose a ground location to crash into. When you hit the ground, all enemies in the radius are damaged and stunned.
Press [{s:iv_attack}] to crash down early.

name: Siphon Life
description: Drain health from enemies in front of you while they are in the radius.

name: Exploding Uppercut
description: Deal Light Melee damage to nearby units and send them flying back, causing area damage and fire rate slow where they land. Does not damage allies.

name: Sticky Bomb
description:
Attach a Sticky Bomb to a nearby target that deals explosive damage after a short fuse time.
Gain a bomb stack that gives +{s:BonusDamagePctPerPlayerHit}% bomb damage for every enemy hero hit. Lose {s:BonusLossPerDeath} Stacks on death.
Hold [{s:key_alt_cast}] to cast a Sticky Bomb on yourself.

name: Hyper Beam
description: Charge up your laser to unleash a powerful torrent of energy that deals damage and slows enemies' movement and dashes. You have slow movement and turn rate for the duration. If activated in the air, you will hover while unleashing the beam.

name: Hook
description: Launch out a hook that grabs and reels in the first hero it hits and deals damage to enemies. Target will be placed where you are facing.

name: Pulse Grenade
description: Throw a grenade that begins pulsing when it lands. Each pulse applies damage, movement slow, and stacking damage amplification for {s:hero_name} against the victim.

name: Time Wall
description: Create a time warping wall that stops time for all enemy projectiles and bullets that touch it. Enemies that touch the wall will take damage as a percentage of their max health and be briefly slowed.

name: Kinetic Carbine
description:
Start charging your weapon and gain increased movement speed once it's fully charged. Your next shot will release the energy, dealing spirit damage and applying a time stop to the enemy hit. The damage dealt is an amplification of your current weapon damage.

You can slow time on yourself by pressing [{s:iv_attack2}] while an empowered shot is available.

name: Paradoxical Swap
description: Fire a projectile that swaps your position with the target enemy hero. While the effect occurs, you gain spirit lifesteal and the enemy takes damage over time.

name: Kinetic Pulse
description: Release an energy pulse that knocks enemies up into the air.

name: Quantum Entanglement
description: {s:hero_name} briefly disappears into the void and then reappears a short distance away. On reappearing, your weapon is reloaded and has a fire rate bonus for the next clip (Max {s:FireRateBonusDurationMax}s). Can be cast with [{s:key_alt_cast}] to also bring nearby allies and give them half fire rate bonus.

name: Rejuvenating Aurora
description: While channelling, restore health over time to you and any allies nearby. Dashing does not break channel.

name: Singularity
description: Create a singularity in your hands that pulls in nearby enemies and damages them. Once it's finished, enemies get knocked into the air.

name: Medicinal Specter
description: Deploy a spirit that heals nearby units.

name: Mini Turret
description:
Deploy a Mini Turret that automatically shoots enemies. The turret expires after a limited lifetime.
Turrets gain {s:TurretHealthScaling}% of {s:hero_name}'s max health and have {s:TechResist}% Spirit Resist. They deal reduced damage to troopers and objectives.

name: Spectral Wall
description:
Creates a wall that divides the terrain in half. On creation, the wall deals damage and applies slow to enemies nearby.
After casting, press [{s:iv_attack}] or [{s:in_ability3}] to erupt the wall early.

name: Heavy Barrage
description: Unleashes a volley of rockets that home in on a targeted location.

name: Essence Bomb
description:
Sacrifice some of your health to launch a bomb that deals damage after a brief arm time.
Self damage type is Spirit and can be mitigated.

name: Malice
description: Sacrifice some of your health to launch blood shards that apply a stack of Malice. Each stack slows the victim and increases the damage they take from you. The slow effect decreases over time.

name: Life Drain
description:
Create a tether that drains enemy health over time and heals you. Target must be in line of sight and within max range to drain. You can shoot and use other abilities during the drain, but your movement speed is reduced by half.
[Alt-Cast] to give health to friendly Heroes.
Press [{s:in_ability2}] to cancel.

name: Soul Exchange
description: Swaps health levels with an enemy target. There is a minimum health percentage that enemies can be brought down to and a minimum amount of health received based on victims current health.

name: Lightning Ball
description: Shoot a ball of lightning that travels in a straight line. Does damage to all targets in its radius. Slows down when damaging enemies and stops if it hits the world.

name: Static Charge
description:
Apply a charge to a target enemy hero. After a short duration, the static charge stuns and damages enemies within the radius.
Alt-Cast to cast on yourself.

name: Power Surge
description: Power up your weapon with a shock effect, making your bullets proc shock damage on your target. This shock damage bounces to enemies near your target. Occurs once per burst shot.

name: Storm Cloud
description: Channel an expanding storm cloud around you that damages all enemies within its radius. Enemies do not take damage when they are out of line-of-sight. You have increased Bullet Resist during the channel.

name: Sleep Dagger
description: Throw a dagger that damages and sleeps the target. Sleeping targets wake up shortly after being damaged. Throwing a Dagger does not break your invisibility. Sleep Dagger does not interrupt enemies' channeling abilities.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: Fade out of sight, becoming invisible and gaining sprint speed. Attacking removes invisibility. Close enemies can see through your invisibility.

name: Fixation
description: Shooting a target increases your bullet damage on that target. Gain one stack per bullet hit, two if the hit is a headshot.

name: Bullet Dance
description: Enter a flurry, firing your weapon at nearby enemies with perfect accuracy.

name: Stake
description: Throw a stake that tethers enemies to the location where the stake lands. Enemy movement is restricted to the length of the tether.

name: Flight
description: Leap into the air and fly. While in flight your weapon deals bonus spirit damage.

name: Crow Familiar
description: Your crow familiar deals impact damage, reduces their bullet resist and applies a bleed that deals damage based on the target's current health.

name: Assassinate
description: Use your scoped rifle to fire a powerful shot over long distances. Deal only partial damage until fully charged after 1s of being scoped. Does bonus damage to enemies with less than {s:LowHealthEnemyThresholdPct}% health remaining. Landing a killing blow on a player with Assassinate grants you bonus souls.

name: Concussive Combustion
description: Turns you into a living bomb that explodes after a short delay, stunning all enemies in its radius.

name: Flame Dash
description:
Move forward at high speed and leave a flame trail that burns enemies. Infernus gains {s:SlowResistancePercent}% slow resistance for the duration.
Hold [{s:iv_attack}] to dash faster.

name: Catalyst
description: Spew napalm that slows enemy movement and amplifies the damage {s:hero_name} does to them.

name: Afterburn
description: Your bullets build up to apply a burning effect on enemies. {s:hero_name}'s bullets and abilities will refresh the duration.

name: Arctic Beam
description: Shoot freezing cold energy out in front of you, damaging targets and building up movement and fire rate slow against them the longer you sustain the beam on them. You have reduced movement speed while using Arctic Beam. The beam may also claim Souls.

name: Ice Path
description:
{s:hero_name} creates a floating trail of ice and snow that gives movement bonuses to him and his allies. Kelvin gains {s:SlowResistancePercent}% slow resistance for the duration. Enemies can also walk on the floating trail.
Press [{s:key_innate_1}] / [{s:key_duck}] to travel up or down while in Ice Path.

name: Frost Grenade
description: Throw a grenade that explodes in a cloud of freezing ice, damaging and slowing enemies.

name: Frozen Shelter
description:
{s:hero_name} freezes the air around him, creating an impenetrable dome around himself. While in the dome, allies rapidly regenerate health and enemies are slowed.
Objectives becomes Invulnerable and Frozen under Frozen Shelter.

name: Grapple
description: Pull yourself through the air toward a target. Using Grapple also resets your limit of air jumps and dashes.

name: Ground Strike
description: Stomp the ground beneath you, damaging enemies in front of you. If you perform Ground Strike while airborne, you quickly dive towards the ground. Damage grows slower after 25m.

name: Death Slam
description:
Focus on enemies to connect whips to them. After channeling, connected enemies are lifted and stunned then slammed into the ground. Your victims and any enemies in the landing zone will be damaged and slowed.
Press [{s:iv_attack}] to throw connected enemies early. Enemies that are not in line of sight or go out of range during the latch time will not be grabbed.

name: Flog
description: Strike enemies with your whip, stealing life from them.

name: Tornado
description: Transform yourself into a tornado that travels forward, damaging enemies and lifting them up in the air. After emerging from the tornado you gain bullet evasion.

name: Djinn's Mark
description: Active: Consume multiplier of Djinn's Mark to deal its damage now.

name: Fire Scarabs
description: Start launching fire scarabs. Each scarab can be launched separately, stealing max health from enemies and applying bullet resist reduction. Cannot apply multiple scarabs to the same enemy. The health gain from hitting heroes is 3x as effective as against non-heroes.

name: Traveler
description: Channeled. Target an ally or visible enemy hero on the minimap, then teleport to where they were when your channel started. After teleporting, you gain movement speed as well as fire rate until your next reload.

name: Scorn
description: Deal damage to nearby enemies and heal yourself based on the damage done. Heal is stronger against enemy heroes.

name: Burrow
description: Burrow underground, moving faster, and gaining spirit and bullet armor. Damage from enemy heroes will reduce the speed bonus. When you jump out, knock enemies into the air and perform a spin attack that damages and slows. Cooldown starts when Burrow ends.

name: Sand Blast
description: Spray sand that disarms enemies in front of you and deals damage.

name: Combo
description: Hold the target in place, stunning them and dealing damage during the channel. If they die during Combo, you permanently gain max health.

name: Sekhmet's Spirit
description:
Send a Spirit Cat forward that grab's targets in its way. Grabbing a Hero will cause an explosion soon after.
Press [{s:in_ability1}] to manually create the explosion.

name: Pounce
description:
Leap at a target to inflict Light Melee damage and slow on nearby enemies.
You may use Pounce on a second target if used within {s:DoublePounceTime}s

name: Ava
description:
Deploy Ava to focus on a nearby enemy. Targetted enemies have reduced healing and heal Ava and {s:hero_name} when damaged. Ava is only active when {s:hero_name} is nearby.
Press [3] to recall Ava
[Alt-Cast] to recall and warp to Ava
The further away from Ava the longer the recall/warp will take. Ava regains health while recalled.

name: Shadow Step
description: Bathe yourself in shadow, to strengthen your attacks and make your dashes Invisible. Hitting enemies with Melee damage will reduce their bullet resist (stacking)

name: Charged Shot
description: Charge up a powerful shot that pierces through enemies. Hold [{s:ability_key}] or [{s:iv_attack}] to hold the shot.

name: Rain of Arrows
description:
Launches you high in the air, allowing you to glide slowly. While airborne, you gain Weapon Damage and multishot on your weapon.
Alt-Cast for reduced jump height.
Press [{s:in_mantle}] to cancel the glide.

name: Immobilizing Trap
description: Throw out a trap that begins to arm itself. Once armed, the trap will trigger when an enemy enters its radius, immobilizing and then slowing them.

name: Guided Owl
description:
After {s:AbilityCastDelay}s cast time, launch a spirit owl that you control and which explodes on impact, damaging and stunning enemies. Hold [{s:iv_attack}] to accelerate the owl.
Press [{s:in_mantle}] to release control. Gain permanent Spirit Power for each enemy hero killed with Guided Owl.

name: Serrated Knives
description: Throw a knife that damages and bleeds an enemy. Each additional hit adds a stack and refreshes the bleed duration, causing the bleed to increase per stack.

name: Slice and Dice
description:
Perform a dash forward, damaging enemies along the path.

Ultimate Unlock: While rage is full an echo of Shiv retraces the dash path after a short delay, damaging enemies again.

name: Bloodletting
description: Take only a portion of incoming damage immediately and defer the rest to be taken over time. Activate to clear a portion of the deferred damage.

name: Flying Cloak
description: Launch a sentient cloak that travels forward and damages enemies. You can press [{s:in_ability2}] to teleport to its location.

name: Enchanter's Satchel
description: Escape into your suitcase. When the duration ends, deal damage to nearby enemies. Duration can be ended early by performing any action.

name: Barrage
description:
Channel to start launching projectiles that deal damage and apply movement slow around their impact point. Each projectile landed on a hero grants you a stacking buff that amplifies all of your damage.
If you cast it while in the air, you'll float and maintain any horizontal momentum you started with.

name: Affliction
description:
Apply damage over time to all enemies nearby.
Affliction's damage is non-lethal and does not apply item procs.

name: Watcher's Covenant
description: Gain bonuses and automatically connect with a nearby ally to share them. Healing is replicated among all those connected. Connection requires line of sight. Press [{s:in_ability2}] to Lock on to a target

name: Kudzu Bomb
description: Summon a patch of choking vines that damages and slows enemies in its radius.

name: Stone Form
description: Turn yourself into impervious stone and smash into the ground, stunning and damaging enemies nearby. Heals you for a percentage of your max health. You have some air control before falling.

name: Air Drop
description:
Take flight with an ally or a bomb. Drop your ally or bomb to cause a large explosion that causes movement slow. {s:hero_name} and ally gain a bullet shield when flying ends.
While lifted, your ally gains bullet resist but cannot attack and deals {s:AllyOutgoingDamagePercent}% damage. Air Drop has faster cast time when targeting an ally.
[{s:iv_attack}] to accelerate flying speed.
[{s:iv_attack2}] to drop ally/bomb.

name: Splatter
description: Throw a ball of goo that deals damage and leaves puddles of goo behind that apply movement slow to enemies in the radius.

name: The Cube
description: Encase the target in a cube of restorative goo that protects from damage, and increases health regen. Target is unable to take any new actions while cubed. Can be used on self. Press [{s:in_mantle}] to escape early.

name: Goo Ball
description: Morph into a large goo ball that deals damage and stuns enemies on impact. The ball grants large amounts of Bullet and Spirit resist, bounces off walls and can double jump.

name: Puddle Punch
description: Materialize a fist in the world that punches units in the area and send them flying. Enemies will be dealt damage, have their dash distance reduced for a brief moment, and have their movement slowed. This is considered a Light Melee attack.

name: Binding Word
description: Curse an enemy hero. If they don't move away from their initial position within the escape time, they will be damaged and immobilized.

name: Willpower
description: Gain a spirit shield and bonus movement speed.

name: Alchemical Flask
description: Throw a flask that damages, slows, and reduces the weapon damage and stamina of enemies it hits.

name: Last Stand
description:
After charging for {s:AbilityCastDelay}s, release pulses that damage enemies and heal you based on the damage done.
While channeling Last Stand you have greatly increased bullet resist.

name: Telekinesis
description: Lift an enemy hero into the air, stunning them for a short time. When the lift ends, the target receives Telekinesis damage.

name: Project Mind
description: Teleport to the targeted location.

name: Full Auto
description: Temporarily boosts your fire rate. Nearby allies receive half the fire rate bonus.

name: Card Trick
description: Deal weapon damage to summon cards.  Activate to throw a card that flies towards the enemy or point under your crosshair.

name: Wrecking Ball
description: Create a large ball of scrap that can be thrown, damaging and stunning anything it hits. The ball takes time to create and you move slower while carrying it.

name: Consume
description: Stuns an enemy trooper or NPC, damaging them while held. A successful kill provides a fire rate bonus, and restores a Bio Blast charge. This bonus stacks independently

name: Bio Blast
description: Shoots out a blast of consumed remains, damaging and slowing enemies. Multiple hits increase the slow.

name: Magnetic Flux
description: Grabs any enemy looked at by Wrecker, putting them in stasis and holding them overhead. Stuns, and damages all captured enemies when finished. Any grabbed NPCs are salvaged.

name: Astral Walk
description: Launch a flying shadow copy of yourself that you control, teleporting your original body to wherever it lands. The teleport explosion slows enemies and deals damage based on how long you were flying.

name: Power Slash
description:
Channel to increase damage over {s:AbilityCastDelay} seconds, then release a fully-charged sword strike.
Press [{s:in_ability1}] or [{s:iv_attack}] to trigger the strike early, dealing partial damage.

name: Flying Strike
description: Throw a grappling hook to reel yourself towards an enemy, damaging and slowing the target when you arrive.

name: Crimson Slash
description: Slash enemies in front of you, damaging them and slowing their fire rate. If any enemy heroes are hit, you heal.

name: Shadow Transformation
description: Become infused with Yamato's shadow soul. After an initial invincible transformation, your abilities are refreshed and are 60% faster, and you gain immunity to negative status effects. You are unable to die in this mode.
